result.execSummary:
All charges against Rashad Terrel Gooch in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Rashad Terrel Gooch is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Rashad Terrel Gooch

records.addlTxt: Witness fee request prepared for Shelby F. was approved for 1 appearance on 08/31/2022 by the DAs Victim/Witness Services.

Defendant Rashad Terrel Gooch not in court, in custody.  Attorney Joel Alan Mogren Aty in court for Rashad Terrel Gooch.  Prosecuting attorney Josh Milder in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Case set for jury trial.  State's essential witness failed to appear.  State has no alternative theory of prosecution.  Defense motion to DISMISS is granted by the Court WITHOUT PREJUDICE.

Defendant Rashad Terrel Gooch in court with attorney Joel Alan Mogren.  Josh Milder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for final pretrial conference. Court conducts final pretrial conference with counsel off the record.  Court places status on the record. Defense requests victim appear in person for jury trial date. Court GRANTS request and orders victim to appear in person on the next date. Case remains calendared for jury trial on 8/31/2022 at 9:00 am in Branch 35.  Parties are advised that effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Audrey Skwierawski, Branch 41 in Room 501 of the Courthouse.

Attorney Joel Alan Mogren in court, defendant Rashad Terrel Gooch not in court, in custody.  Elaine B. Fehrs appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for status conference. Case is in trial posture, defense counsel requests case be placed on the trial calendar. Any pretrial motions to be filed a week before the final pretrial date. Case adjourned to Branch 35. Parties are advised that effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Audrey Skwierawski, Branch 41 in Room 501 of the Courthouse.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Statment from Danyelle Cummings. Return address 7610 N. 78th apt 3, Milwaukee, WI 53223.

Defendant Rashad Terrel Gooch in court with attorney Joel Alan Mogren.  Gerald Henry Alder appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for pretrial conference. Defense requests status date to determine case posture. Case adjourned to Branch 35.  Status conference scheduled for May 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with DNC, SF-B.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.
  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Rashad Terrel Gooch in court with attorney Robert J Hampton.  Defendant Rashad Terrel Gooch in custody.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.

  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Rosa, Branch 35.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
